name: Kid's DIY House Builder
description:
Kid's DIY House Builder Game.

Great Game for Children Designing and Building Their Own House.  
using Simple Touch and Slide Action. 

Build Your Own House.  
Great Fun for Preschool, Nursery, Kindergarten or Even Older Children. Build using Brick or Stone. Add a Roof of Tile or Straw.
Choose from a range of Windows Frames, Doors.
Add Hedges, Lawn and Flowers.
Easy Controls for Toddlers, Mums and Dads.

FREE Version.

Please Rate**********************
